scripts.check: npm run test && npm run build && npm run clean
scripts.build:umd: cross-env FINDIFY_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.ts dist/prod/findify-analytics.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env FINDIFY_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.ts dist/prod/findify-analytics.min.js
scripts.build:umd-staging: cross-env FINDIFY_ENV=staging NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.ts dist/staging/findify-analytics.js
scripts.build:umd:min-staging: cross-env FINDIFY_ENV=staging NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.ts dist/staging/findify-analytics.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build-staging: npm run build:umd-staging && npm run build:umd:min-staging
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm test && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run check && git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop && git merge master && git push
